summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1892, for the improvement of West Seventy-third Street from Eighth Avenue Northwest to Fifteenth Avenue Northwest; Eli Avenue Northwest from West Seventieth Street to West Seventy-third Street, and Thirteenth Avenue Northwest from West Seventy-third Street to West Seventy-fifth Street, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks therein, together with all necessary crosswalks and surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 19560, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
